overview: Peter North is a private Dick working L.A.'s mean streets, those fabled boulevards that snake through Tinsel Town like so many gilded paths to hell. He had life beat, once. He had more cash than he knew what to do with and a jaw-dropping squeeze with whom he knew exactly what to do. But that was before he got sloppy and it all came to an end one night when a shadow came alive and ol' Pete became one more stiff taking up a body bag in the L.A. morgue. Now his girl, Lené is on the trail of the killer, and he's closer than she thinks. Luckily, she's got Asia Carerra on her side. Asia, a psychic, channels Pete's voice to help Lené solve the crime. Meanwhile, Asia gets very close to her new friend. This is story-driven erotica with a killer cast and lava-hot sex. Look especially for Chloe and big Pete's standout anal bout, and the Asia-Lené sapphic showdown. Also of note is Lené and Peter's otherworldly coital contact. Smoldering all the way through, and a great choice for couples.
title: Bawdy and Soul
